sentences: Ta ei saanud tulla ajapuuduse tõttu.
context: The Estonian word 'vabandada' means to make an excuse, apologize, or provide justification for something. It is used when explaining reasons for absence, delay, or mistake. In the provided example sentences, it appears in context with time-related excuses (ajapuuduse - lack of time). The verb can be conjugated in different forms depending on tense and subject.
